data.title: First American - Title Insurance, Specialty Insurance, and Real Estate-Related Services
data.meta_description: First American Financial Corporation provides comprehensive title insurance protection and professional settlement services for homebuyers and sellers, real estate agents and brokers, mortgage lenders, commercial property professionals, homebuilders and developers, title agencies and legal professionals to facilitate real estate purchases, construction, refinances or equity loans.
data.text:
The confidence to move forward.

Put our unmatched experience to work for you.

Get nationwide service with local expertise. Connect with a First American office near you.

Find Your Office

Title Insurance & Settlement Services

Get comprehensive title insurance protection and professional settlement services to facilitate and streamline real estate transactions.

Whether you're a homebuyer or seller, a real estate agent, mortgage broker or lender, commercial property professional, builder, developer, title agency, or legal professional, we're your trusted guide for seamless closing transactions.

Learn More

Lender & Servicer Solutions

Drive your digital evolution forward with First American's powerful technology and the richest datasets in the industry.

Learn More

Home Warranty

Protect your budget against costly repairs and replacements on your home's essential systems and appliances. Cover systems such as heating, air conditioning, plumbing, and appliances like dishwashers, ovens, clothes washers/dryers, refrigerators, water heaters and more - items typically not covered by homeowners insurance.

Learn More

Real Estate Data Solutions

Instantly research properties, determine homeownership, verify valuation and gain fresh mortgage insights with property-centric data that spans 100% of the nation. Get the real estate data you need to drive informed business decisions, reduce risk, and fuel innovation.

Learn More

Trust Services

Gain peace of mind with a partner you can trust for investment management, trust, and banking services â€” with a special expertise in real estate management.

Learn More

Experience the freedom of true ownership.

Be certain that your biggest investment is protected. Learn more about the importance of title insurance and how to secure your ownership rights.

Discover the Power of Title Insurance

Trust in the strength of an industry leader.

For more than a century, customers have trusted our dedicated people, our financial strength and our innovative spirit to solve problems and help them move forward.

Be at ease in your new home.

Buying a home doesn't have to be overwhelming. Get the guidance you need to understand the homebuying process and the importance of protecting your investment.

Get Resources for Homeowners

Keep pace with changing dynamics.

Our expert economists breakdown residential and commercial real estate trends to help you stay a step ahead.

Loading blog posts...

Protect yourself from cyber theft.

Identity theft and cyber crime is on the rise. Stay ahead of the latest threats that can affect your transactions and discover how to protect yourself by visiting First American's Security and Privacy Center.

Visit Our Security and Privacy Center

Working together to elevate and innovate.

Our success is our people. Learn more about the people and culture that make First American a great place to work.
